verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁמַ֞ע <S%H8085><s%> heard הַכְּנַעֲנִ֤י <S%H3669><s%> the Canaanite מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> And [when] king עֲרָד֙ <S%H6166><s%> Arad יֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> which dwelt הַנֶּ֔גֶב <S%H5045><s%> in the south כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> came יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> tell that Israel דֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way הָאֲתָרִ֑ים <S%H871><s%> of the spies וַיִּלָּ֙חֶם֙ <S%H3898><s%> then he fought בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> against Israel וַיִּ֥שְׁבְּ ׀ <S%H7617><s%> and took מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> some שֶֽׁבִי׃ <S%H7628><s%> [some] of them prisoners

וַיִּדַּ֨ר <S%H5087><s%> vowed יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> And Israel נֶ֛דֶר <S%H5088><s%> a vow לַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If נָתֹ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> If thou wilt indeed תִּתֵּ֜ן <S%H5414><s%> deliver אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> this people הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this בְּיָדִ֔י <S%H3027><s%> into my hand וְהַֽחֲרַמְתִּ֖י <S%H2763><s%> then I will utterly destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עָרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5892><s%> their cities

וַיִּשְׁמַ֨ע <S%H8085><s%> hearkened יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> to the voice יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיִּתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> and delivered up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <S%H3669><s%> the Canaanites וַיַּחֲרֵ֥ם <S%H2763><s%> and they utterly destroyed אֶתְהֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עָרֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5892><s%> them and their cities וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> and he called שֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> the name הַמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> of the place חָרְמָֽה׃ <S%H2767><s%> Hormah פ

וַיִּסְע֞וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they journeyed מֵהֹ֤ר <S%H2023><s%> Hor הָהָר֙ <S%H2022><s%> from mount דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way יַם־ <S%H3220><s%> sea ס֔וּף <S%H5488><s%> of the Red לִסְבֹ֖ב <S%H5437><s%> to compass אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land אֱד֑וֹם <S%H123><s%> of Edom וַתִּקְצַ֥ר <S%H7114><s%> was much discouraged נֶֽפֶשׁ־ <S%H5315><s%> and the soul הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H1870><s%> because of the way

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> spake הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> And the people בֵּֽאלֹהִים֮ <S%H430><s%> against God וּבְמֹשֶׁה֒ <S%H4872><s%> and against Moses לָמָ֤ה <S%H4100><s%> Why הֶֽעֱלִיתֻ֙נוּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> Wherefore have ye brought us up מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt לָמ֖וּת <S%H4191><s%> to die בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> desert כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> is no לֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H3899><s%> bread וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> and no מַ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> neither [is there any] water וְנַפְשֵׁ֣נוּ <S%H5315><s%> and our soul קָ֔צָה <S%H6973><s%> loatheth בַּלֶּ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> food הַקְּלֹקֵֽל׃ <S%H7052><s%> this light

וַיְשַׁלַּ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> sent יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD בָּעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> among the people אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> הַנְּחָשִׁ֣ים <S%H5175><s%> serpents הַשְּׂרָפִ֔ים <S%H8314><s%> fiery וַֽיְנַשְּׁכ֖וּ <S%H5391><s%> and they bit אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> the people וַיָּ֥מָת <S%H4191><s%> died עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people רָ֖ב <S%H7227><s%> and much מִיִּשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיָּבֹא֩ <S%H935><s%> came הָעָ֨ם <S%H5971><s%> Therefore the people אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> to Moses וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> and said חָטָ֗אנוּ <S%H2398><s%> We have sinned כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because דִבַּ֤רְנוּ <S%H1696><s%> for we have spoken בַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD וָבָ֔ךְ הִתְפַּלֵּל֙ <S%H6419><s%> and against thee pray אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> with יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וְיָסֵ֥ר <S%H5493><s%> that he take away מֵעָלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> and אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנָּחָ֑שׁ <S%H5175><s%> the serpents וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֥ל <S%H6419><s%> prayed מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> from us And Moses בְּעַ֥ד <S%H1157><s%> for הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> for the people

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses עֲשֵׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> Make לְךָ֙ שָׂרָ֔ף <S%H8314><s%> thee a fiery serpent וְשִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> and set אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on נֵ֑ס <S%H5251><s%> it upon a pole וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> shall come כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> everyone הַנָּשׁ֔וּךְ <S%H5391><s%> and it shall come to pass that every one that is bitten וְרָאָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> when he looketh אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> וָחָֽי׃ <S%H2425><s%> upon it shall live

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> made מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> And Moses נְחַ֣שׁ <S%H5175><s%> a serpent נְחֹ֔שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> of brass וַיְשִׂמֵ֖הוּ <S%H7760><s%> and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַנֵּ֑ס <S%H5251><s%> it upon a pole וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> came אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if נָשַׁ֤ךְ <S%H5391><s%> had bitten הַנָּחָשׁ֙ <S%H5175><s%> and it came to pass that if a serpent אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> any man וְהִבִּ֛יט <S%H5027><s%> when he beheld אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about נְחַ֥שׁ <S%H5175><s%> the serpent הַנְּחֹ֖שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> of brass וָחָֽי׃ <S%H2425><s%> he lived
וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> set forward בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּאֹבֹֽת׃ <S%H88><s%> in Oboth

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> And they journeyed מֵאֹבֹ֑ת <S%H88><s%> from Oboth וַֽיַּחֲנ֞וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּעִיֵּ֣י הָֽעֲבָרִ֗ים <S%H5863><s%> at Ijeabarim בַּמִּדְבָּר֙ <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> which [is] before מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> Moab מִמִּזְרַ֖ח <S%H4217><s%> east side הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <S%H8121><s%> east side
מִשָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there נָסָ֑עוּ <S%H5265><s%> From thence they removed וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched בְּנַ֥חַל <S%H5158><s%> in the valley זָֽרֶד׃ <S%H2218><s%> of Zared

מִשָּׁם֮ <S%H8033><s%> there נָסָעוּ֒ <S%H5265><s%> From thence they removed וַֽיַּחֲנ֗וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched מֵעֵ֤בֶר <S%H5676><s%> on the other side אַרְנוֹן֙ <S%H769><s%> of Arnon אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> which [is] in the wilderness הַיֹּצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> that cometh out מִגְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> of the coasts הָֽאֱמֹרִ֑י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אַרְנוֹן֙ <S%H769><s%> for Arnon גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> [is] the border מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between מוֹאָ֖ב <S%H4124><s%> between Moab וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between הָאֱמֹרִֽי׃ <S%H567><s%> and the Amorites

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> it יֵֽאָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> Wherefore it is said בְּסֵ֖פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in the book מִלְחֲמֹ֣ת <S%H4421><s%> of the wars יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> וָהֵ֣ב <S%H2052><s%> What he did בְּסוּפָ֔ה <S%H5492><s%> in the Red sea וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנְּחָלִ֖ים <S%H5158><s%> and in the brooks אַרְנֽוֹן׃ <S%H769><s%> of Arnon

וְאֶ֙שֶׁד֙ <S%H793><s%> And at the stream הַנְּחָלִ֔ים <S%H5158><s%> of the brooks אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that נָטָ֖ה <S%H5186><s%> that goeth down לְשֶׁ֣בֶת <S%H3427><s%> to the dwelling עָ֑ר <S%H6144><s%> of Ar וְנִשְׁעַ֖ן <S%H8172><s%> and lieth לִגְב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> upon the border מוֹאָֽב׃ <S%H4124><s%> of Moab

וּמִשָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there בְּאֵ֑רָה <S%H876><s%> And from thence [they went] to Beer הִ֣וא <S%H1931><s%> that הַבְּאֵ֗ר <S%H875><s%> that [is] the well אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> where אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> spake יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> whereof the LORD לְמֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses אֱסֹף֙ <S%H622><s%> together אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> the people וְאֶתְּנָ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> and I will give לָהֶ֖ם מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> them water ס

אָ֚ז <S%H227><s%> Then יָשִׁ֣יר <S%H7891><s%> sang יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Then Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשִּׁירָ֖ה <S%H7892><s%> this song הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise עֲלִ֥י <S%H5927><s%> Spring up בְאֵ֖ר <S%H875><s%> O well עֱנוּ־ <S%H6030><s%> sing לָֽהּ׃

בְּאֵ֞ר <S%H875><s%> the well חֲפָר֣וּהָ <S%H2658><s%> digged שָׂרִ֗ים <S%H8269><s%> The princes כָּר֙וּהָ֙ <S%H3738><s%> digged נְדִיבֵ֣י <S%H5081><s%> the nobles הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people בִּמְחֹקֵ֖ק <S%H2710><s%> it by [the direction of] the lawgiver בְּמִשְׁעֲנֹתָ֑ם <S%H4938><s%> with their staves וּמִמִּדְבָּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> And from the wilderness מַתָּנָֽה׃ <S%H4980><s%> [they went] to Mattanah
וּמִמַּתָּנָ֖ה <S%H4980><s%> And from Mattanah נַחֲלִיאֵ֑ל <S%H5160><s%> to Nahaliel וּמִנַּחֲלִיאֵ֖ל <S%H5160><s%> and from Nahaliel בָּמֽוֹת׃ <S%H1120><s%> to Bamoth

וּמִבָּמ֗וֹת <S%H1120><s%> And from Bamoth הַגַּיְא֙ <S%H1516><s%> [in] the valley אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> is in בִּשְׂדֵ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> that [is] in the country מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab רֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> to the top הַפִּסְגָּ֑ה <S%H6449><s%> of Pisgah וְנִשְׁקָ֖פָה <S%H8259><s%> which looketh עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> toward הַיְשִׁימֹֽן׃ <S%H3452><s%> Jeshimon פ

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> sent יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> And Israel מַלְאָכִ֔ים <S%H4397><s%> messengers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to סִיחֹ֥ן <S%H5511><s%> unto Sihon מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

אֶעְבְּרָ֣ה <S%H5674><s%> Let me pass בְאַרְצֶ֗ךָ <S%H776><s%> through thy land לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> We will not נִטֶּה֙ <S%H5186><s%> we will not turn בְּשָׂדֶ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> into the fields וּבְכֶ֔רֶם <S%H3754><s%> or into the vineyards לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> we will not נִשְׁתֶּ֖ה <S%H8354><s%> we will not drink מֵ֣י <S%H4325><s%> [of] the waters בְאֵ֑ר <S%H875><s%> of the well בְּדֶ֤רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> [high] way הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> by the king's נֵלֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> will go עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after נַעֲבֹ֖ר <S%H5674><s%> until we be past גְּבֻלֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1366><s%> thy borders

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not נָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> would not suffer סִיחֹ֣ן <S%H5511><s%> And Sihon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <S%H3478><s%> Israel עֲבֹ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> to pass בִּגְבֻלוֹ֒ <S%H1366><s%> through his border וַיֶּאֱסֹ֨ף <S%H622><s%> together סִיחֹ֜ן <S%H5511><s%> but Sihon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עַמּ֗וֹ <S%H5971><s%> all his people וַיֵּצֵ֞א <S%H3318><s%> and went out לִקְרַ֤את <S%H7125><s%> against יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Israel הַמִּדְבָּ֔רָה <S%H4057><s%> into the wilderness וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> and he came יָ֑הְצָה <S%H3096><s%> to Jahaz וַיִּלָּ֖חֶם <S%H3898><s%> and fought בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> against Israel

וַיַּכֵּ֥הוּ <S%H5221><s%> smote יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> And Israel לְפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> him with the edge חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> of the sword וַיִּירַ֨שׁ <S%H3423><s%> and possessed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְצ֜וֹ <S%H776><s%> his land מֵֽאַרְנֹ֗ן <S%H769><s%> from Arnon עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far יַבֹּק֙ <S%H2999><s%> unto Jabbok עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> even unto the children עַמּ֔וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for עַ֔ז <S%H5794><s%> [was] strong גְּב֖וּל <S%H1366><s%> for the border בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon

וַיִּקַּח֙ <S%H3947><s%> took יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> And Israel אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הֶעָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> all these cities הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וַיֵּ֤שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> dwelt יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> and Israel בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> in all the cities הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites בְּחֶשְׁבּ֖וֹן <S%H2809><s%> in Heshbon וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּנֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H1323><s%> and in all the villages

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For חֶשְׁבּ֔וֹן <S%H2809><s%> For Heshbon עִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> [was] the city סִיחֹ֛ן <S%H5511><s%> of Sihon מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> who וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> who נִלְחַ֗ם <S%H3898><s%> who had fought בְּמֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king מוֹאָב֙ <S%H4124><s%> of Moab הָֽרִאשׁ֔וֹן <S%H7223><s%> against the former וַיִּקַּ֧ח <S%H3947><s%> and taken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אַרְצ֛וֹ <S%H776><s%> all his land מִיָּד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> out of his hand עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far אַרְנֹֽן׃ <S%H769><s%> even unto Arnon

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> after that יֹאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> say הַמֹּשְׁלִ֖ים <S%H4911><s%> Wherefore they that speak in proverbs בֹּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> Come חֶשְׁבּ֑וֹן <S%H2809><s%> into Heshbon תִּבָּנֶ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> be built וְתִכּוֹנֵ֖ן <S%H3559><s%> and prepared עִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> let the city סִיחֽוֹן׃ <S%H5511><s%> of Sihon

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> For אֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> For there is a fire יָֽצְאָ֣ה <S%H3318><s%> gone out מֵֽחֶשְׁבּ֔וֹן <S%H2809><s%> of Heshbon לֶהָבָ֖ה <S%H3852><s%> a flame מִקִּרְיַ֣ת <S%H7151><s%> from the city סִיחֹ֑ן <S%H5511><s%> of Sihon אָֽכְלָה֙ <S%H398><s%> it hath consumed עָ֣ר <S%H6144><s%> Ar מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab בַּעֲלֵ֖י <S%H1167><s%> the dominant בָּמ֥וֹת <S%H1116><s%> height אַרְנֹֽן׃ <S%H769><s%> of Arnon

אוֹי־ <S%H188><s%> Woe לְךָ֣ מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> to thee Moab אָבַ֖דְתָּ <S%H6><s%> thou art undone עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> O people כְּמ֑וֹשׁ <S%H3645><s%> of Chemosh נָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> he hath given בָּנָ֤יו <S%H1121><s%> his sons פְּלֵיטִם֙ <S%H6412><s%> that escaped וּבְנֹתָ֣יו <S%H1323><s%> and his daughters בַּשְּׁבִ֔ית <S%H7628><s%> captive לְמֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king אֱמֹרִ֖י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites סִיחֽוֹן׃ <S%H5511><s%> unto Sihon

וַנִּירָ֛ם <S%H3384><s%> We have shot אָבַ֥ד <S%H6><s%> is perished חֶשְׁבּ֖וֹן <S%H2809><s%> at them Heshbon עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far דִּיב֑וֹן <S%H1769><s%> even unto Dibon וַנַּשִּׁ֣ים <S%H8074><s%> and we have laid them waste עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> even נֹ֔פַח <S%H5302><s%> even unto Nophah אֲשֶׁ֖רׅ <S%H834><s%> Which עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> even מֵֽידְבָֽא׃ <S%H4311><s%> which [reacheth] unto Medeba
וַיֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> dwelt יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Thus Israel בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land הָאֱמֹרִֽי׃ <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> sent מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> And Moses לְרַגֵּ֣ל <S%H7270><s%> to spy out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יַעְזֵ֔ר <S%H3270><s%> Jaazer וַֽיִּלְכְּד֖וּ <S%H3920><s%> and they took בְּנֹתֶ֑יהָ <S%H1323><s%> the villages [וַיִּירֶשׁ כ] (וַיֹּ֖ורֶשׁ <S%H3423><s%> cast out ק) אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֱמֹרִ֥י <S%H567><s%> the Amorites אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וַיִּפְנוּ֙ <S%H6437><s%> And they turned וַֽיַּעֲל֔וּ <S%H5927><s%> and went up דֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way הַבָּשָׁ֑ן <S%H1316><s%> of Bashan וַיֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> went out עוֹג֩ <S%H5747><s%> and Og מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king הַבָּשָׁ֨ן <S%H1316><s%> of Bashan לִקְרָאתָ֜ם <S%H7125><s%> against ה֧וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עַמּ֛וֹ <S%H5971><s%> them he and all his people לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> to the battle אֶדְרֶֽעִי׃ <S%H154><s%> at Edrei

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָ֣א <S%H3372><s%> Fear אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> into בְיָדְךָ֞ <S%H3027><s%> him into thy hand נָתַ֧תִּי <S%H5414><s%> him not for I have delivered אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עַמּ֖וֹ <S%H5971><s%> and all his people וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְצ֑וֹ <S%H776><s%> and his land וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> and thou shalt do לּ֔וֹ כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who עָשִׂ֗יתָ <S%H6213><s%> to him as thou didst לְסִיחֹן֙ <S%H5511><s%> unto Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> which dwelt בְּחֶשְׁבּֽוֹן׃ <S%H2809><s%> at Heshbon

וַיַּכּ֨וּ <S%H5221><s%> So they smote אֹת֤וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> him and his sons וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עַמּ֔וֹ <S%H5971><s%> and all his people עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בִּלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> until there was none הִשְׁאִֽיר־ <S%H7604><s%> left ל֖וֹ שָׂרִ֑יד <S%H8300><s%> him alive וַיִּֽירְשׁ֖וּ <S%H3423><s%> and they possessed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְצֽוֹ׃ <S%H776><s%> his land
